basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Lactobacillus spp, Lactococcus lactis, Listeria innocua, Listeria monocytogenes, Oenococcus oeni, Leuconostoc mesenteroides, Pediococcus acidilactici, Pediococcus pentosaceus, Enterococcus faecalis, Propionibacterium freudenreichii, Staphylococcus aureus.
